div.head: Report:
div.p: 1) Project 1: T3SS effector SlrP Structure of a truncated form of SlrP in complex with human Thioredoxine I tested 25 crystals and I collected 3 complete data sets. Crystals diffracted in space group P2 1 2 1 2 1 (a=107.83Å, b=133.44Å, c=155.49Å).
The data sets were of poor quality and did not allow us to solve the structure by molecular replacement using the available structures of two homologous T3SS effectors.

div.head: 2) Project 2: Quorum sensing effector NprR Apo-form of full length NprR
div.p: The first crystals tested on ID23-2 (06/21/2010) only diffracted up to 10Å resolution. We used the additive screen to improve their diffraction quality. I tested around 25 crystals. They diffracted up to 7Å in space group P222 (a=116Å, b=142Å, c=316Å). The diffraction was anisotropic and the effect of the additive screen on the quality of the diffraction was not sufficient to collect any complete data set on this project.
Resolution (Å) Completeness (%) I/sig(I) (last shell) Rmeas (%) Crystal 1 3.5 99 16.42 (3.62) 11.2 Crystal 2 3.5 99.6 16.87 (3.42) 13.7 Crystal 3 3.5 98.2 4.16 (2.28) 20.8
